tool.name: utils.update_params

configfiles.configfile:
import scanpy.api as sc
sc.utils.update_params( old_params = '$old_params', new_params = '$new_params', check = '$check',)

tool.help:
Update old_params with new_params.
If check==False, this merely adds and overwrites the content of old_params.
If check==True, this only allows updating of parameters that are already present in old_params.
Parameters ---------- old_params : dict new_params : dict check : bool, optional (default: False)
Returns ------- updated_params : dict
